item.description:
Twenty-fifth Annual
LGBT Film Festival
May 6-17, 2009

The MFA presents a dynamic, international roster of films exploring gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender experience and culture. For more information about the Festival, including the full schedule, film trailers, and more, please visit: http://www.bostonlgbt...

All films are shown at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston
Avenue of the Arts
465 Huntington Avenue
Boston, Massachusetts 02115

The Boston Dyke March is Co-Sponsoring
Three Films:

Women's Opening Night: I Canâ€™t Think Straight
Wednesday, May 6, 2009, @ 7 pm

Queer Women of Color Shorts
Friday, May 8, 2009, @ 6 pm

Women's Shorts
Thursday, May 14, 2009, @ 6 pm
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lobby. Please join us. Thanks.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March

item.name: Boston Dyke March Presents: LGBT Film Festival: Women's Opening Night, May 6
